item.title: Basic text elements
item.description: Page demonstrates basic text elements of markdown. We are interested here in size of headers, spaces between text elements, etc. The content of this page is shown via shortcode. Welcome h1 Introduction h2 Subheading h3 Another Subheading h3 Subheading h4 Another subheading h4 Subheading h5 Subheading h6 Welcome h1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

item.title: Overview
item.description: Please explain in few sentences the basic idea of this template and choosen approach (github-pages + github + bootstrap). Give links to most important resources and tutorials.

item.title: Get started
item.description: Please explain how to start. How to install hugo How to set-up gh-pages branch. How to modify content (i.e. add item to the documentation) and publish on gh-pages.

item.title: List elements
item.description: Page demonstrates basic list elements. We are interested here in list identation, spaces between list and paragraphs etc. Unordered list item 1 item 2 Another item Another item Another item item 3 item 4 Ordered list Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Item 3a Item 3b Paragraph in section to compare gaps against lists Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

item.title: Python code embedded
item.description: This tutorial explains how to embed Python code from a script, located in certain directory. Highlight the file located in static directory import sys import numpy class Base: """ Base class """ def __init__(self): self.x = None self.y = numpy.sin(numpy.pi/2.0) def value(self): return self.y def say_hello(): """ Prints 'Hello World' message """ b = Base() print("Hello World", b.value()) if __name__ == '__main__': say_hello()

item.title: Highlight on client side
item.description: Code highlight using javascript library. class Base: """ Base class """ def __init__(self): self.x = None self.y = numpy.sin(numpy.pi/2.0) def value(self): return self.y

item.title: Allerts, notices and panels
item.description: This tutorial demonstrates, how to insert various alerts, colored boxes etc to highlight information on a page,

item.title: Action buttons
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates, how to insert action buttons (i.e. links to travis builds, “follow me” etc)

item.title: Labels and icons
item.description: Tutorial demonstrates, how to insert labels (like “new”, “updated”) to the text; place small glypicons.

item.title: Image gallery
item.description: Image gallery for screenshots and similar. Grid of image 3x3, click on image starts gallery.

item.title: Tabs embedded, accordions
item.description: A page with information structured in accordion-manner, or in tabs (e.g. installation instruction in tab “Windows” and tab “Linux”).
